title: The Bodyguard
description: A former Secret Service agent grudgingly takes an assignment to protect a pop idol who's threatened by a crazed fan. At first, the safety-obsessed bodyguard and the self-indulgent diva totally clash. But before long, all that tension sparks fireworks of another sort, and the love-averse tough guy is torn between duty and romance.

reviews.text: I watched it for the soundtrack and the chemistry between Whitney Houston and Kevin Costner. If not for these two actors, the movie wouldn't have been as successful as it was.

Good movie with an interesting insight in the job as a bodyguard. Costner is playing well as always, even though his role is rather boring. Whitney Houston is stealing a lot of attention because her role is much more sympathic. The plot itself could be a bit better but on the other side I dont watch romances anymore and this movie caught me. Also I am sad to see such an incredible singer and entertainer to lose because of drugs.
